moves.1. e4:
I am white and   billabong2 is black.
This game I put a lot of heat on black from the start .
moves.3... Nf6: starting to build his minor pieces
moves.4. Na3: both knights out doing a good job on building minor pieces
moves.5... d6: Has piece ready to take  knight when the time is right.
moves.9... Nxf2: takes but I can take his knight
moves.10... Qxe5: takes knight. I felt it was more important to get rid of that black knight than save my white knight.
moves.13. Nxf7: now i can take the queen
moves.17... Bxf2+: i can take that bishop on my next turn.
moves.18. Kxf2: takes bishop. black king is in wide open space.
moves.19. b4: has a check mate plan ready after this move
moves.19... axb4: ready to put my check  mate plan in action
moves.20. Qxg7+: check moves 20 to 27 was all Conditional moves
